Title: Relates to the use of powers of attorney in banking transactions
Summary: Requires all banking institutions in the state to accept a statutory short form power of attorney and powers of attorney which survive disability or incompetence; references existing provisions relating to powers of attorney in the general obligations law; holds banks harmless for such acceptance unless they have actual written notice of revocation or termination.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to the use of powers of attorney in banking transactions
